content: Taking place long after the end of Sun Wukong's famous tale, you'll journey to different regions all over China, from serene forests filled with wolf and snake demons, to parched desert ridges and snow mountains and more. Your quest will be to find and collect all six of Sun Wukon's Sage Relics, but you'll need to master the art of the staff and Sun Wukong's famous magical abilities to survive the many Yaoguai Kings that stand in your way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Myth_Wukong_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Black Myth: Wukong Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Taking place long after the end of Sun Wukong's famous tale, you'll journey to different regions all over China, from serene forests filled with wolf and snake demons, to parched desert ridges and snow mountains and more. Your quest will be to find and collect all six of Sun Wukon's Sage Relics, but you'll need to master the art of the staff and Sun Wukong's famous magical abilities to survive the many Yaoguai Kings that stand in your way.
